name: Dark Quizlet-Midnight Easy Read (BETA) - BROKEN
description:
This is a heavily modified version of wabamn's "Dark Quizlet-Midnight," designed to be far more legible. However, this is in BETA, so many parts of the site are not finished, but it is still quite functional. 
EDIT: CURRENTLY BROKEN BY UPDATE!

discussions.name: There is an update to the midnight theme, so you can update this to fix the theme.
